reviewText: This was a ok video. I did not like how it when from one year to the next. It jumped around and went back to other years. It did not show airmen working in one job and how the base housing was,
Purchased as a gift for my dad for his birthday. He LOVES this DVD. Thanks for an amazing product. 5 star!
Fantastic set of DVD's!!  I got these for my husband, who is an Air Force veteran.........he loves them!
Very informative. Just a little difficult for me to figure out how to select different sections of the video.
The DVD was terrific and the customer service was even better!  Thank you so much and keep up the good work!

I can't give this dvd another 5 star rating like the previous reviewers.
The video quality of this dvd is horrid  The subject matter is good but it skips around too much.  The dvd spends a whole two minutes on the Vietnam War -- wow -- not much of a salute to all of those who served in southeast asia.
I needed a good dvd to show a high school class (Veterans Day lecture).  It definitely won't be this one.
Great gift for dad!
I bought the DVD for my father-in-law, who retired from the airforce. This was a perfect gift for him and a unique find. He enjoyed the video very much. Thx

Would absolutely recommend this DVD for anyone who appreciates the Air Force. I bought this DVD for my husband who has an uncle that was a captain in the Air Force. He also loves history so I knew he would love it and he did.
I purchased this as a gift for my husband and was excited to see the bonus footage to know I was getting a quality video. This is real footage and my military buff will be excited!

I'm retired USAF, some of these occurred before my time and some during....kinda nice to see the old airframes and maybe a quick clip with one of my Chiefs as a kid...great addition to any collection.  Thanks much for bringing back memories.
Great old movies

Excellent! I am taking a course in aviation history and saw this on Amazon. The price was great and so is the video. Covering three quarters of a century of history, we have a good coverage of the US Air Force. From the Army Signal Corps, the Army Air Corps, to the US Air Force, a very good compelation of actual footage and narrative.

I bought this for my dad who served 20 years in the Air Force, he loves the history plus seeing some of the "old planes" brings a smile to his face and fond memories. I followed in his footsteps and served 24 years in the Air Force. A great historical collection, I just hope he lets me come over and watch it too. A great product.
Grandpa was excited to receive this as a Christmas gift.

I received the DVD promptly. It is a Christmas gift for my dad so he hasn't seen it yet. He is a 92 year old WWII Vet who retired from the Air Force. I'm sure he will enjoy it because he loves everything Air Force.

I was amazed at how promptly my order of this DVD was sent and the courtesy of the company. I saw this historic Army Air Corps DVD on sale and immediately bought it for a friend who is 93 years old and was a crew member on a B 17 in WW2 that flew missions over Europe. He still wears his original Army Air Corps uniform for events. I know he will enjoy watching History of the Air Force DVD with its sections, especially the section of 1943. What a great Christmas gift and what a good company to buy it from.
Met my expectations and was a unique gift for someone about to enlist in the Air Force.

"Very nice DVD and well worth the price. I am a retired USAF officer and USAF brat, so I was around the Air Force from 1947 to 1992. The video brought back fond memories." The service was excellent and included a follow-up. I will buy from them anytime. You should too if you like the older pictures of the Air Force..
Interesting

I love the historical footage of early air exploration and the incorporation into our military. We Americans can be proud of our nation's innovation of air power as demonstrated in these films during crucial wartime challenges.
Great DVD arrived right on time!
All about pilots---not any of the rest of the Air Force...
The quality of the video was sub par also sound should have been better.
all in all a pretty thorough history. I bought this for my dad who served 21 years in the Army Air Corp/ Air Force

Don't buy this "collection" of rare videos. It's just old AF history videos that are available for free on youtube. The audio and video are awful which leads me to believe they just lifted them from youtube, and burned them to DVD (they couldn't even be bothered to to name the DVD file).

Update: Without my asking, Stonebridge has refunded me the purchase of this disc. This has led me to up my rating to 3 stars for the customer service (the customer service by itself is worth 5 stars). As for the product, still not the best for me. I was born into, and grew up in the USAF, and spent my summer hours in museums and the base library studying this history. So, if this video looks interesting to you, give it a go. If it turns out it's not for you, they will take care of you.
I have received the DVD and have enjoyed it thoroughly. I am interested in any other DVDs you may have concerning Air Force History. Thanks for the prompt delivery!

I bought this for Christmas as a gift and Ralph and my dad who are both Air Force Veterans and they absolutely loved it! It was a fantastic DVD, a high quality product with cool information on the history of the Air Force, including information they both weren't aware of. Thank you for making something so unique for those hard to buy for men in our family. :)  The DVD was delivered promptly ahead of schedule with great customer service that followed up to ensure we received it in time for Christmas. Thank you again!

This is an excellent documentary and terrific images. I plan to use it in several of my university courses.
Gary D. Joiner, PhD.
Great film on the beginnings of the United States Air Force,  Any Air Force Vet will love.  Very informative.

"It is for my boss who served in the Air Force for 38 years.  There is a wall at our office that has nothing but him as a young man till retirement with the Air Force.  He has many stories he tells us often.  So I wanted to get him something for Christmas that I thought he would enjoy and came across this. "  Yes I did receive it  Perfect condition.  It's wrapped and sitting under my tree for my boss who is retired Air Force major.  I am sure he is going to love it. He is also a history buff!
Due to my work schedule last night was the first time I had a chance to look at the video. It is a great video. It brings back memories of my 20 years in the USAAF and the USAF(1946-1966)
Nicely compiled where easy to follow. Very informative.
A collection of USAF vintage video that is poorly put together and edited.  A video glitch with the DVD about half way through.  I didn't even finish watching the whole DVD.  Returned it.
Good AF history
I love the old history films ! Refresh me on some history I totally forgot. I just love this DVD and happy to add to my collection.

I did receive the DVD and thoroughly enjoyed it. When I ordered it, I believed it would be more technical in nature, as opposed to historical. Upon receipt, I realized it was in fact historical. Being an aviation buff I enjoy the historical as well. It is a well done anthology  of the growth and change of the Air Force over the years.

Keep up the good work.
"I really enjoy the episodes and the great footage & story."
Bought this for my grandson who is entering the Air Force in May. He really enjoyed it. I'm looking forward to one that shows more recent history.
Grandson was excited to get this.
Great documentary

I was looking forward to this, as a retired USAF officer, but the DVD stopped working at the end of the 1941 portion.  It could not be restarted.  Please send your address and I will send it back to you.

My father is both retired airforce and pilot. This was a great gift for his love of the history of flying. It I'd amazing to see where we have come from to our current modern airforce. This DVD provided a great revisit of the past and discussion of advancements technology has brought us.
Great historical review of America's Air Force!  Took great patience to maneuver around the chapters.  The advance did not work well.
Great product and customer service!
This is a gift for a neighbors birthday. I hope he enjoys it
VERY Dated.
Great Christmas gift!

A very selective and politically correct, diversity oriented documentary. I was hoping for more film about the early history and the part that I, and my squadrons, lived and made during the 60's and 70's. This is somebody's home movies about aspects of the largest corporation in the world, at one time, that have nothing to do with its mission, people and machines.
Awesome dvd.  Fast shipping. I am glad I made this purchase, very informative. Thank you.
